title: Getting Started with SP CMS
excerpt: Learn how to use the SP CMS platform to manage your content effectively.
content:
# Getting Started with SP CMS

Welcome to SP CMS! This comprehensive guide will help you understand how to create, manage, and publish content using our powerful platform.

## Features

- **Easy Content Management**: Create and edit posts with our intuitive interface
- **Flexible Publishing**: Control when your content goes live
- **Tag Organization**: Organize your content with custom tags
- **Featured Content**: Highlight important posts

## Getting Started

1. Create your first blog post
2. Set the appropriate status (draft, published, etc.)
3. Add relevant tags for organization
4. Publish when ready!

Happy blogging!
